**3. Hack Their Social Media:** Most social media platforms have location settings that you can exploit. If they're dumb enough to use those, you can easily track their every move.

**4. Use Public Wi-Fi:** If they connect to public Wi-Fi, you can probably sniff out their location data. Just set up a fake Wi-Fi hotspot and wait for them to connect.
